,listactionwant:function(d){var c=d.getSelectionCount(),b=d.getSelection(),a=d.getShowRecord(),e={cmd:"",tvdbid:a.get("tvdbid")};Ext.each(b,function(f,g){cmd="episode.setstatus_"+g;e.cmd+=cmd+"|";e[cmd+".season"]=f.get("season");e[cmd+".episode"]=f.get("episode");e[cmd+".status"]="wanted"});if(e.cmd[e.cmd.length-1]=="|"){e.cmd=e.cmd.substr(0,e.cmd.length-1)}Ext.Msg.confirm("Mark Episodes Wanted","Are you sure you want to mark these "+c+" episodes as wanted?",function(f){if(f=="yes"){
